TopicTitle: not possible to collect the log data from the magnetometer

Articles.Content:
Well, basically what the header says. And I can't find a reason why. I put a screenshot here: https://drive.google.com/file/d/1NVtf5X88pmAjBGQJSq5gMdbeN0wGUuan/view?usp=sharing

as one can see on the  screenshot the game is heavily modded and I'm using the magnetometer version of universal storage and haven't tried to vanilla one but I have more or less rebuild the whole plane so it's not in the save of the craft and it worked for a long time before it suddenly stopped working for no obvious reason.

any idea?

Since your partinfo window also shows an autoLOC issue ("#autoLOC_SCANsat_ScanResourceDisplay" instead of "SCAN Resources"), I guess something messed up your ScanSat install or at least interfered with its configs.

I would suggest to reinstall ScanSat and if it doesn't fix it, please provide a log file
